metadata.title: CVE-2024-8088 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: There is a HIGH severity vulnerability affecting the CPython "zipfile"module.When iterating over names of entries in a zip archive (for example, methodsof "zipfile.ZipFile" like "namelist()", "iterdir()", "extractall()", etc)the process can be put into an infinite loop with a maliciously craftedzip archive. This defect applies when reading only metadata or extractingthe contents of the zip archive. Programs that are not handlinguser-controlled zip archives are not affected.

criterions.comment: python3.12 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
